divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i left our house at around 9 pm and went about 1\2 mile up our road to stop sign by post office and off of us 92 in debary fl we stopped at sign and we both saw 3 red orange circles with no flashing lights that looked like they where coming down in a staggered positions then they started going up in the sky so we both left the bikes and ran across us 92 to get a better look as the first 3 disappeared 3 more came in and where coming down and they had no noise at all but where like a red and orange color sphere or circle shape so i pulled out my phone and took some pictures with my phone and even had a guy stop his car and ask if i was alright and he saw the last one as well go faint and disappear. so we ran back to the bikes to recoup and decided to go up the road all was clear until we went to orange city then headed back down 92 towards home and saw the huge v shape thing or like duck formation ufos shape thing plane that had these orange circles that lit up then stopped and it turned towards where the objects where going and the lights went out by could still see triangle shape with a red thing in middle of it def weird. stuff going on.
Summary: wife and I went out too ride our motorcycles and saw 6 fireballs that went down then up and gone!!!
trends: There have been no other sightings in DeBary
This sighting has never been favorited.
